abstract: Governing curators at Missouri give university chancellor Brady Deaton the authority to move the university out of the Big 12 if he decides that is in its best interest.
snippet: The governing curators at Missouri unanimously gave Chancellor Brady Deaton the authority to move the university out of the Big 12 if he decides that is in the program’s best interest.
lead_paragraph: The governing curators at Missouri unanimously gave Chancellor Brady Deaton the authority to move the university out of the Big 12 if he decides that is in the program’s best interest.

headline.main: Path Clear for Possible Missouri Move
headline.seo: Path Clear for Possible Missouri Move
